name: Sharp Shooter Zombie Hunter
description:
Find a safe place to stay alive. Hunt or be Hunted
Use your shooting skills to avoid an horrible death

You will stay in your place without moving and aiming around and shooting the Zombies
Use your weapons, hunter knife, scope rifle.

The New Survival Shooting hunter Game is here!!

Can you survive the whole travel to find a safe place?
You are the last person on your group and your house has been infested with the dead, you need get out of there, or you will end as a undead ghoul.
The travel is hard, highways full of roamers, cities destroyed, abandoned houses, extreme blizzard and infested beach.
Walkers are behind you , always.
Before you could move to the next area you need to clean the current.
An advice to finish this game: Never give up.

Sharp shooter zombie hunter best features:
Sniper Rifle, hunting knife, powerful Pistol, Crossbow , Explosive Arrows, disgusting and scary zombies, , awesome shooting levels, dangerous roamers , Hills, full of danger, Nightmare gameplay are some of the best features on this Game, don't miss them.!
